title: Reports to department of taxation
context: ยง431:7-205 Reports to department of taxation. The commissioner shall promptly report to the department of taxation all amounts of taxes collected under section 431:7-201 to section 431:7-204 and section 431:8-315 and all amounts of refunds of such taxes made under section 431:7-203. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
